title: LOTR (1993) Screening & Reaction - Part 1/3
description: Another obscure Tolkien adaptation to enjoy together!  This time, it is a 1993 miniseries adaptation out of Finland.  This is sure to be another interesting adaptation - which includes TOM BOMBADIL!  The series is fully subtitled in English and we will take this screening in 3 parts - in a special weekend screening experience of Friday-Saturday-Sunday, so be sure to tune in for each day's livestream!

title: LOTR (1993) Screening & Reaction - Part 2/3
description: We continue our livestream screening of the 1993 Finnish adaptation of The Lord of the Rings in this second of three parts!  (English subtitles provided.)  Be sure to check out all three parts of this sure-to-be-epic viewing experience!
